author: James Sharpe
title: Ange: We lost because we’ve got 10 injuries - The Mail
text: ANGE POSTECOGLOU blamed the tiredness of his injury-ravaged Tottenham squad after they suffered a thumping 4-2 defeat at Brighton last night.
